Neil Swingler <nswingler@...> said: 

> I did wonder about using classloaders to load mock versions of specified classes.

That's an interesting idea.

> One possibility would be to use an alternative source tree for mock classes
> with the same fully qualified name.
> 
> Another possibility would be to load a class from a different package in the same source
> tree and rename it.

One things that's important not to miss, however, is that the _process_ of using mock objects pushes the code towards a more compositional style (which is a Good Thing). 

Of course, sometimes you have to jump through hoops when working with third-party libraries.
